GT.content: circular ring of “giving back (rendre),” circulation of debt not just that of things but values or symbols that are involved there (qui s’y engagent en-gage) [TN footnote on engager & its evocation of pledge]
GT.linkedContent: circular ring of “giving back (rendre),” circulation of debt not just that of things but values or symbols that are involved there (qui s’y engagent en-gage) [TN footnote on engager & its evocation of pledge]

GT.content: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)
GT.linkedContent: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)

POOF.content: via Nietzsche, no longer any homes here, darkness falling on value of value, hence on the very desire for an axiomatic (a consistent, granted, presupposed system of values)
POOF.linkedContent: via Nietzsche, no longer any homes here, darkness falling on value of value, hence on the very desire for an axiomatic (a consistent, granted, presupposed system of values)

OH.content: spirit as exemplary example, example par excellence, of value (source of value)
OH.linkedContent: spirit as exemplary example, example par excellence, of value (source of value)

PAS.content: Blanchot’s folding displaces typical opposition, hierarchy, value of value
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot’s folding displaces typical opposition, hierarchy, value of value

WM.content: for Saussure, value in language, which allows exchange btwn words, allows metaphor, requires 1) dissimilar exchange 2) similar comparison
WM.linkedContent: for Saussure, value in language, which allows exchange btwn words, allows metaphor, requires 1) dissimilar exchange 2) similar comparison

WM.content: value, gold, eye, sun carried along in same tropic movement
WM.linkedContent: value, gold, eye, sun carried along in same tropic movement

SP.content: acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche belongs to metaphysics because his thought aimed to culminate it [Derrida asks whether belonging has one value, and, if so, would it carry belonging beyond itself]
SP.linkedContent: acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche belongs to metaphysics because his thought aimed to culminate it [Derrida asks whether belonging has one value, and, if so, would it carry belonging beyond itself]

SP.content: once there’s valuation (valorisation) of the proper, it can never be interrupted, a permanency that is valuation itself > its necessity must be interrogated sans cesse [re: Heidegger]
SP.linkedContent: once there’s valuation (valorisation) of the proper, it can never be interrupted, a permanency that is valuation itself > its necessity must be interrogated sans cesse [re: Heidegger]

GSP.content: in late Husserl, [quasi-Hegelian teleological reason] movement of meaning can only be a norm/value not essence
GSP.linkedContent: in late Husserl, [quasi-Hegelian teleological reason] movement of meaning can only be a norm/value not essence

PS.content: for Artaud, God is false value of initial worth of what is born: this false value becomes Value, for it doubled what never existed > the work (excrement) repeats this theft, steals another part of me [dispossessing my nonexistent ur-value prior to exiting the Orifice]
PS.linkedContent: for Artaud, God is false value of initial worth of what is born: this false value becomes Value, for it doubled what never existed > the work (excrement) repeats this theft, steals another part of me [dispossessing my nonexistent ur-value prior to exiting the Orifice]

FS.content: in structuralism, structure: preformationsim, teleologism, reduction of force, value & duration
FS.linkedContent: in structuralism, structure: preformationsim, teleologism, reduction of force, value & duration

FS.content: when all value 1st constituted by theoretical subject, diaphanousness is supreme value, univocity > hence, difficulty in thinking genesis & mysterious failures called crises
FS.linkedContent: when all value 1st constituted by theoretical subject, diaphanousness is supreme value, univocity > hence, difficulty in thinking genesis & mysterious failures called crises

FS.content: Husserl’s solution: forgetting is eidetically dictated, necessary, under rubric of “sedimentation” > for the development of truth
FS.linkedContent: Husserl’s solution: forgetting is eidetically dictated, necessary, under rubric of “sedimentation” > for the development of truth

WAP.content: philosophical determination of indestructible responsibility, concepts of its axiomatics (will, subject, “I” w/ free will, property, self-presence of intention), can always be deconstructed
WAP.linkedContent: philosophical determination of indestructible responsibility, concepts of its axiomatics (will, subject, “I” w/ free will, property, self-presence of intention), can always be deconstructed

DPi.content: for Kant, CI, eye for an eye, talionic law, surpasses value of life and all price: no law will ever be founded on unconditional love of life (life for life’s sake)—on the absolute refusal of any sacrifice of life
DPi.linkedContent: for Kant, CI, eye for an eye, talionic law, surpasses value of life and all price: no law will ever be founded on unconditional love of life (life for life’s sake)—on the absolute refusal of any sacrifice of life

DPi.content: both abolitionists & Kant speak of price, value, dignity above Marketpries > for Kant, jus talionis is pure equivalence not revenge, impersonal principle of reparative justice
DPi.linkedContent: both abolitionists & Kant speak of price, value, dignity above Marketpries > for Kant, jus talionis is pure equivalence not revenge, impersonal principle of reparative justice

RGE.content: phenomenology of mind (phenomenology in general) correspond to restricted economy, restricted to commercial values, “science dealing w/ utilization of wealth”: circuit of reproductive consumption, limited to established value of objects and their circulation
RGE.linkedContent: phenomenology of mind (phenomenology in general) correspond to restricted economy, restricted to commercial values, “science dealing w/ utilization of wealth”: circuit of reproductive consumption, limited to established value of objects and their circulation

RGE.content: absolute production and destruction of value escapes phenomenology as restricted economy
RGE.linkedContent: absolute production and destruction of value escapes phenomenology as restricted economy

Gii.content: everything Heidegger says about man takes on meaning and value w/in oppositional limit to animal (it is dogmatic and serious)
Gii.linkedContent: everything Heidegger says about man takes on meaning and value w/in oppositional limit to animal (it is dogmatic and serious)

Gii.content: man’s hand infinitely removed from prehensile organs through the abyss of its being “durch einen Abgrund des Wesens”
Gii.linkedContent: man’s hand infinitely removed from prehensile organs through the abyss of its being “durch einen Abgrund des Wesens”

EJQB.content: [cf. FS p. 30 Nietzsche’s new table] breaking of Tables: rupture w/in God as origin of history
EJQB.linkedContent: [cf. FS p. 30 Nietzsche’s new table] breaking of Tables: rupture w/in God as origin of history

LI.content: SEC concerned w/ system of values associated w/ truth: repeating and altering that system
LI.linkedContent: SEC concerned w/ system of values associated w/ truth: repeating and altering that system

LI.content: context, if you like: entire “real-history-of-the-world” in which value of truth and objectivity have taken on meaning and imposed themselves
LI.linkedContent: context, if you like: entire “real-history-of-the-world” in which value of truth and objectivity have taken on meaning and imposed themselves

LI.content: nothing outside text = nothing outside context [less shocking, more to think about?]; deconstruction doesn’t denounce (neither can nor ought to do so) the “values” dominant in its socio-institutional situation, its language, historical inscription of its gestures (i.e. truth)
LI.linkedContent: nothing outside text = nothing outside context [less shocking, more to think about?]; deconstruction doesn’t denounce (neither can nor ought to do so) the “values” dominant in its socio-institutional situation, its language, historical inscription of its gestures (i.e. truth)

E.content: poetic speech, beyond finite commerce (out of circulation), yet of infinite value: the universal analogical equivalent, the value of values; through poetry, work of mourning turns hetero-affection into auto-affection, producing maximum of disinterested pleasure
E.linkedContent: poetic speech, beyond finite commerce (out of circulation), yet of infinite value: the universal analogical equivalent, the value of values; through poetry, work of mourning turns hetero-affection into auto-affection, producing maximum of disinterested pleasure

OG.content: [early who/what] sacrifice the I am present for what I am, what I’m worth: renounce my present life to achieve myself in ideality/truth > writing is the phenomenon of this battle (replaces presence by value)
OG.linkedContent: [early who/what] sacrifice the I am present for what I am, what I’m worth: renounce my present life to achieve myself in ideality/truth > writing is the phenomenon of this battle (replaces presence by value)
